cause.description:
MARE exists to find "a place to call HOME" for CHILDREN in foster care, including sibling groups and children who are traditionally harder to place. We do this by recruiting, educating, supporting and advocating for FAMILIES throughout the adoption process.
Visit the website and waiting children at www.mareinc.org
1. Recruit qualified adoptive parents.
2. Educate the community about waiting children.
3. Support families through the adoption process
cause.mission: to find children in foster care a permanent home.
cause.name: MARE
